pages.text: $(li)The Savanna is a warm biome composed mostly by Grass.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can find some vegetation, like Acacia trees, Cactus, Poppies, Dandelions, Alliums, Grass and sometimes Spruce or Oak trees.

$(li)Some animals like Roadrunners, Kangaroos, Emus, Elephants and Gazelles can be found here.$(br)$(li)On the nights Hushes will be around the Deserts too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Savanna$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
